title: 58. Leaving Corporate, Taking Leaps + Working for Your SELF with LAUREN!
description:
Hi Roomies,

Look who's back for a special episode... Lauren Kruger! My former pod host joins me to talk about what she's been up to since she left the pod... starting a business as a candle maker. We talk about the pros + cons of being a business owner, how to get started with a new business, and how we decided it was the right fit for us. We hope this gets you inspired + gives you that push to go after that dream!

Connect with Lauren on Instagram:

@goodintentions_studio

@laurens.esthetics

Purchase Lauren's candles
